titleStmt.title: An additional Act for setling the militia of the City of Westminster, and the liberties thereof, and places adjacent Thursday, July 14. 1659. Ordered by the Parliament, that this Act be forthwith printed and published. Thomas St. Nicholas Clerk of the Parliament.
Public General Acts. 1659-07-14.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by John Field and Henry Hills, printers to the Parliament and are to be sold at the seven Stars in Fleet-street over against Dunstans Church,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.

place.placeName: the seven Stars in Fleet-street over against Dunstans Church
